entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming north 30 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
